overview: If you love hot sexy Android Women obeying your every command, then you have come to the right world. For the first time Technosexuals, ASFR (Alt.Sex.Fetish.Robots), and Robot Fetishists alike now have a movie series that caters to their specific technological sexual proclivity.  Series 8: Missy stomps into the living room only to find her Mommy in a very compromising position. Her panel was open for all to see with bright lights coming out of her fingers and her mouth was filled with flashing strobes! Missy was in shock. She called to her Mommy but she did not answer nor did she even acknowledge Missy was there. She just stared off to space while her lighted hands worked on her stomach! Missy finally yells at her! Mommy blinks, turns her head and smiles Yes Dear? She can not believe her eyes! She asks her Mom what the hell was going on?
title: SciFi DreamGirls 8: Aftermarket Upgrade
